mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.author,a.create_time FROM article a, category c, article_category ac, WHERE c.id=#{id} AND c.id=ac.article_id, AND a.id=ac.article_id;
SELECT a.id, a.title, a.author,a.create_time FROM tag t, category c, article_tag at, WHERE t.id=#{id} AND t.id=ac.article_id, AND t.id=ac.article_id;
